events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

The two execution skiffs hover over the looming Pit of Carkoon. One of the Weequay drivers takes a moment to salute Jabba the Huttâ€™s approaching barge, when you make your move.

A headbutt topples the pirate into the controls, sending the skiff into a dive. The craft crashes and crumples, throwing you from the wreckage. Your captors fare worse, being swallowed by the excited Sarlacc.

eventActions.tbText: Not far away, your allies struggle for control of the second skiff.
The Weequay mercenaries guarding the second skiff turn toward you, weapons drawn.
Below, the lone surviving Gamorrean guard from the first skiff is shaken, but staggers to his feet and readies his axe, grunting encouragement to his comrade on the second skiff.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: Deploy the heroes divided as evenly as possible between the blue highlights.
Deploy the heroes divided as evenly as possible between the blue highlights.

eventActions.tbText:
You break free of your binds.

{-} Deploy the heroes divided as evenly as possible between the blue highlights.
In the dunes, Imperial forces, gathered to witness your execution, ready their weapons, too.
The skiff is flying low enough that the ladder below the hatch reaches the ground.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The hatch leads down to the ladder of the first skiff.

{-} A figure can move between this hatch and the blue ladder as if they were adjacent spaces.
{-} A figure on this Skiff can perform {O} attacks as though it was on the blue ladder. When an attack is declared this way, apply +2 Accuracy to the attack results.
{-} A figure in an exterior space can perform {O} attacks targeting a figure on this Skiff as though the target was on the blue ladder. When an attack is declared this way, apply -2 Accuracy to the attack results.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} Colored mission tokens on Skiffs represent hatches. Colored mission tokens on exterior spaces represent ladders. A figure can move between hatches and ladders of the same color as if they were adjacent spaces.
{-} A figure on a Skiff can perform {O} attacks as though it was on the ladder corresponding to the hatch on that Skiff. When an attack is declared this way, apply +2 Accuracy to the attack results.
{-} A figure in an exterior space can perform {O} attacks targeting a figure on a Skiff as though the target was on the corresponding ladder. When an attack is declared this way, apply -2 Accuracy to the attack results.
{-} Once during his activation, if a hero controls a terminal, he may move the ladder of the same color up to 2 spaces, ignoring terrain.
{-} When a ladder enters a space adjacent to a Rebel figure, heroes may place that figure on the corresponding Skiff.
{-} Heroes on Skiffs gain: 1 {C}: Choose an adjacent, small, hostile figure and test {K}. If you receive 2 or more successes, place that figure in a space adjacent to the corresponding skiff ladder, and that figure suffers 1 {H}. If that figure is placed in the Sarlacc Pit (red highlight), it is defeated.

You wrestle some weapons from the fallen guards and get ready to fight for your lives.

{-} The mission will progress at the end of Round 2.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Colored mission tokens on Skiffs represent hatches. Colored mission tokens on exterior spaces represent ladders. A figure can move between hatches and ladders of the same color as if they were adjacent spaces.

{-} A figure in an exterior space can perform {O} attacks targeting a figure on a Skiff as though the target was on the corresponding ladder. When an attack is declared this way, apply -2 Accuracy to the attack results.

{-} When a ladder enters a space adjacent to a Rebel figure, heroes may place that figure on the corresponding Skiff.
{-} Heroes on Skiffs gain: 1 {C}: Choose an adjacent, small, hostile figure and test {K}. If you receive 2 or more successes, place that figure in a space adjacent to the corresponding skiff ladder, and that figure suffers 1 {H}. If that figure is placed in the Sarlacc Pit (red highlight), it is defeated.
{-} The mission will progress at the end of Round 2.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: You corner Jabba and Bib in the hold. Without his court and guards, the Hutt is only a glimmer of the legend. Unfazed, he offers congratulations. "Well done, Rebels. Despite our... strained relationship, I can use more fighters like you. What do you say I make you the richest bounty hunters in the galaxy?" Rather than answer, you simply drag the Hutt to the deck in chains, steering the Khetanna directly above the Sarlacc. Facing his own execution now, Jabba offers a new deal. "Stop. Stop! Kill me and there will be war on Tatooine. A war for my palace. You will not escape it, and your friends will not survive. Instead, take my ships, your friends, and some credits, as a gift. And get off my planet!" Despite Jabbaâ€™s arrogance, thereâ€™s truth in his threat. Eager for safety, you drag the Hutt back to his palace, rather than risk any more conflict. With the Rebellionâ€™s new ships fully loaded with cargo and refugees, you chain Jabba to his throne and disappear into the stars, safe at last. {-} The Rebels win the campaign!

A swarm of skiffs catches up with the Khetanna, and the deck is quickly covered in mercenaries. Weequay jab your legs, forcing you to kneel as Jabba worms his way to the deck. â€œImpressive, Rebels. You could have been the most feared bounty hunters in the galaxy. Instead, you will be slowly devoured, and your friends will be my slaves." As you're led to the railing, Jabba crunches on a paddy frog while you think one last time of the lives you couldn't save. {-} The Rebels lose the campaign.
A single shot from the Khetanna's main gun reduces the door to rubble.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: A security door leads into Jabba's quarters on the Khetanna. {-} The door is locked. It does not block movement, adjacency, counting spaces, or line of sight for Imperial figures.

eventActions.repositionText: Block line of sight to <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color>.

{-} Colored mission tokens on Skiffs represent hatches. Colored mission tokens on exterior spaces represent ladders. A figure can move between hatches and ladders of the same color as if they were adjacent spaces.
{-} A figure on a Skiff can perform {O} attacks as though it was on the ladder corresponding to the hatch on that Skiff. When an attack is declared this way, apply +2 Accuracy to the attack results.

{-} Figures on the Khetanna Deck (green highlight) follow the same rules as figures on Skiffs.
{-} The Rebels win when <color="red">Jabba the Hutt</color> is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: A heavily armed sand skiff fires a flare as it speeds from the Khetanna.

eventActions.tbText: You turn your own skiff toward the new threat. If you manage to seize the second skiff, you can attack the Khetanna from two sides. {-} A figure on a Skiff can perform {O} attacks targeting a figure on another Skiff as though the attacker and defender were each on the corresponding ladders. {-} The mission will progress when a Rebel figure interacts with the red terminal.

events.eventText: The Khetanna lumbers into range and swivels its gun. You see Jabba through a lower window and resolve to end this.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: A ladder leads up to the Khetanna. {-} A figure can move between this ladder and the hatch on the Khetann Deck as if they were adjacent spaces.

eventActions.tbText: {-} The door is locked. It does not block movement, adjacency, counting spaces, or line of sight for Imperial figures.
Jabba's mercenaries man the deck of Jabba's barge.
The Khetanna's main gun swivels in your direction.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: The Main Gun of the Khetanna can be used to fire devastating blaster shots. {-} During his activation, if there are more Rebel figures than Imperial figures adjacent to the Main Gun (a hero with 2 activation tokens counts as 2 figures for this purpose), a Rebel figure can interact with the Main Gun to destroy the door.

The Main Gun of the Khetanna can be used to fire devastating blaster shots. {-} During his activation, if there are more Rebel figures than Imperial figures adjacent to the Main Gun (a hero with 2 activation tokens counts as 2 figures for this purpose), a Rebel figure can interact with the Main Gun to destroy the door.

eventActions.tbText: {-} During his activation, if there are more Rebel figures than Imperial figures adjacent to the Main Gun (a hero with 2 activation tokens counts as 2 figures for this purpose), a Rebel figure can interact with the Main Gun to destroy the door.

Your skiffs speed toward the huge barge.

{-} Figures on the Khetanna Deck (green highlight) follow the same rules as figures on Skiffs.
{-} The mission will progress when the door is destroyed.

events.eventText: The main gun of the Khetanna is a near-constant threat. {-} If the Empire controls the Main Gun, chooses the space on the map the most Rebel figures on or adjacent to it and roll 1 red die. Each Rebel figure on or adjacent to that space suffers {H} equal to the {H} results.

mapEntities.mainText: Deploy the heroes divided as evenly as possible between the blue highlights.
Deploy the heroes divided as evenly as possible between the blue highlights.

This control panel controls the movement of the first skiff.

{-} Once during his activation, if a hero controls this terminal, he may move the blue ladder up to 2 spaces, ignoring terrain.

The hatch leads down to the ladder of the first skiff.

{-} A figure can move between this hatch and the blue ladder as if they were adjacent spaces.
{-} A figure on this Skiff can perform {O} attacks as though it was on the blue ladder. When an attack is declared this way, apply +2 Accuracy to the attack results.
{-} A figure in an exterior space can perform {O} attacks targeting a figure on this Skiff as though the target was on the blue ladder. When an attack is declared this way, apply -2 Accuracy to the attack results.

This control panel controls the movement of the skiff.

{-} Once during his activation, if a hero controls this terminal, he may move the red ladder up to 2 spaces, ignoring terrain.
{-} A Rebel figure can interact with this terminal to seize the skiff.

The hatch leads down to the ladder of the first skiff.

{-} A figure can move between this hatch and the red ladder as if they were adjacent spaces.
{-} A figure on this Skiff can perform {O} attacks as though it was on the red ladder. When an attack is declared this way, apply +2 Accuracy to the attack results.
{-} A figure in an exterior space can perform {O} attacks targeting a figure on this Skiff as though the target was on the red ladder. When an attack is declared this way, apply -2 Accuracy to the attack results.
A ladder leads up to the Khetanna. {-} A figure can move between this ladder and the hatch on the Khetann Deck as if they were adjacent spaces.

The hatch leads down to the ladder of the Khetanna. {-} A figure can move between this hatch and the green ladder as if they were adjacent spaces. {-} A figure on the Khetanna Deck can perform {O} attacks as though it was on the green ladder. When an attack is declared this way, apply +2 Accuracy to the attack results. {-} A figure in an exterior space can perform {O} attacks targeting a figure on the Khetanna Deck as though the target was on the green ladder. When an attack is declared this way, apply -2 Accuracy to the attack results.

The Main Gun of the Khetanna can be used to fire devastating blaster shots. {-} During his activation, if there are more Rebel figures than Imperial figures adjacent to the Main Gun (a hero with 2 activation tokens counts as 2 figures for this purpose), a Rebel figure can interact with the Main Gun to destroy the door.

The Main Gun of the Khetanna can be used to fire devastating blaster shots. {-} During his activation, if there are more Rebel figures than Imperial figures adjacent to the Main Gun (a hero with 2 activation tokens counts as 2 figures for this purpose), a Rebel figure can interact with the Main Gun to destroy the door.
A security door leads into the Khetanna's hold. {-} The door is locked. It does not block movement, adjacency, counting spaces, or line of sight for Imperial figures.
The sarlacc from the Great Pit of Carkoon is waiting, hungry.
The sarlacc from the Great Pit of Carkoon is waiting, hungry.
